dict.acceptation: 损失，减少；丢失，遗失；损耗，亏损；失败；

sent.orig: The composites could reduce nutrient loss by reducing water loss, and could reduce K leaching loss.
sent.trans: 复合材料通过减少水分的流失而达到减少养分流失的目的；膨润土复合材料可明显减少钾的流失。

sent.orig: You may experience loss of sleep, loss of appetite and consequent weight loss.
sent.trans: 你可能会经历失眠、没有食欲以及随之而来的体重减少。

sent.orig: General Loss Reserve [IFC] : Loss Reserve set up to replace Unidentified Loss Reserve.
sent.trans: 一般损失准备金[国际金融公司]：这项准备金的设立是用来代替“未确定损失准备金”的。

sent.orig: Feature: Excellent insertion loss and return loss, Frequency response width, Low loss.
sent.trans: 特点：具有极佳的插入损耗和回波损耗，频率响应宽，损耗低等特点。

sent.orig: A total loss may be either an actual total loss, or a constructive total loss.
sent.trans: 全损可以为实际全损，或者推定全损。
